name: Ernest the Grey
description:
Ernest the Grey

Created as a solo project as a part of PTBOGameJam 03 in August 2017

Watch out for Shank and his falling sharks as you race the clock to save your son.

  • Click Start Game to Begin
  • Movement: Left, Right, Up Arrow Keys & Space to Jump
  • Game over screens will take you back to the menu, just like those 1980's games.
  • Full screen it, because pixel graphic art is great.
